(GraphicsLayer
  (bounds 800.00 600.00)
  (children 1
    (GraphicsLayer
      (bounds 800.00 600.00)
      (contentsOpaque 1)
      (children 1
        (GraphicsLayer
          (bounds 800.00 600.00)
          (drawsContent 1)
          (children 2
            (GraphicsLayer
              (position 8.00 8.00)
              (contentsOpaque 1)
              (children 2
                (GraphicsLayer
                  (bounds 160.00 90.00)
                  (isolate 1)
                  (contentsOpaque 1)
                  (children 1
                    (GraphicsLayer
                      (bounds 160.00 90.00)
                      (blendMode multiply)
                      (contentsOpaque 1)
                      (drawsContent 1)
                      (backgroundColor #0000FF)
                      (children 1
                        (GraphicsLayer
                          (bounds 160.00 90.00)
                        )
                      )
                    )
                  )
                )
                (GraphicsLayer
                )
              )
            )
            (GraphicsLayer
              (bounds 800.00 600.00)
              (drawsContent 1)
            )
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
